p: Of the 40 positive samples, 10 (25%) were negative in the IIF test; of these 10 discordant samples, only 2 (20%) were also negative in the PCR. However, of the 160 negative samples in the reference ELISA, 9 (5%) were positive in the IIF test; of these 9 discordant samples, 3 (33%) were positive for DENV in the PCR ( Table 1).
